title: Why America makes tech tycoons into superheroes
description:
Our founding myths persevere in the hype machine around tech celebrities. University of Washington historian Margaret O’Mara (@margaretomara) explains.

Today’s episode was produced and engineered by Jon Ehrens and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.

Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
